name: Rescue the King! (Gryphbear)
description:
You are Marcus, a lumberjack, who has recently unlocked magic potential inside you. It's been a month or two, where you've been trying to master your abilities, but Magic isn't very easy to learn. 

At the same time, you've been dreaming of a man crying - and needing help, but you don't know who it is, or why he needs help. 

Today, you wake up from a nightmare ... again.

A RPG game with a different kind of magic learning system - and largely in beta status with a few cutscenes, and no combat - at least as of right now. 

Made for Barajam 2020! Only PC version for the moment! 

Cast of Characters: (So far) 

Marcus: The main protagonist. 40 years old. He's a lumberjack, who's recently awaken to his magical potential which seems to have a Force and Water affinity. Has a past relationship of some sort with Tomas? 

Galen: Marcus' tutor - and 17 years old. And a brilliant mage of the Guild. One of the best mages for his young age. He has the Fire and Earth affinities.  

King Terrence: The ruler of the kingdom that Marcus and Galen reside in. He keeps to himself, and has various royal powers that he can grant, if he ever joins in battle with Marcus.
